Peugeot quality has improved a lot over the years. My 7.7 year old Peugeot has no major issues so far. More reliable than my previous VW. But one think I must admit  french design cars to look good but not practical to service. Eg  in order to change battery  have to strip so many things. Same question I had. I tried changing oil once  then realised I don't know how to dispose the oil. Workshops need to pay for disposal so unless you know the workshop well  can pass to them to help. End up I passed the oil to a friend to help dispose at his construction workplace.
And it's actually illegal to repair your car in HDB car park  in case you don't know..
